testcase.name: Sending a message with an order
testcase.system-out: Given Romeo buy a drink.....................................................passed When an order is declared for Juliette......................................passed And a message saying "Wanna chat si zebi?" is added.........................passed Then the ticket must say "From Romeo to Juliette: Wanna chat si zebi?"......passed
